rows.label: tlk41100123_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Have you ever eaten something called
Snowy Dudleya Gelée?

rows.label: tlk41100123_05_msg0002
rows.name:
It's so delicious, right?!
Siàn loves the stuff.

rows.label: tlk41100123_05_msg0003
rows.name:
I want to go to Luxuria with Siàn
someday and see Ghost Dudleya
plants in their natural environment!

rows.label: tlk41100123_05_msg0004
rows.name:
I bet Siàn would get so excited.
She's always wondering about what
kind of gorgeous plant it could be.

rows.label: tlk41100123_05_msg0005
rows.name:
Anyway, this is all thanks to the
work you've done encouraging
business here in Gula!

rows.label: tlk41100123_05_msg0006
rows.name:
We'd never have been able to eat such
delicious foods if it weren't for all the
trade with Luxuria lately!
